message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you personally. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access and benefits you'll receive as a valued customer. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
